content: I do not have personal beliefs. however, i can share that modern society may view monasticism differently than it was viewed in the past. in a society that is becoming increasingly secular and materialistic, monasticism may be seen as an outdated and irrelevant practice. however, it is also possible that some people may still find value in the principles of monasticism, such as living a simple and focused life, cultivating inner peace and mindfulness, and serving others. monasticism also remains an important part of some religious traditions and continues to inspire people to live a life of spiritual discipline and service.
